product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Camp Pillow - Large - Special Buy
long_description: The large-size ALPS Mountaineering Camp Pillow is a necessity for your camping trips when you want to get a good night's sleep. Microfiber outer fabric is soft against your face. TechLoft+ insulation makes the pillow so comfortable that you won't even realize you're away from home while you sleep. Stuff sack included with the ALPS Mountaineering Camp Pillow.
short_description: The large-size ALPS Mountaineering Camp Pillow is a necessity for your camping trips when you want to get a good night's sleep.
